name: Is It Delicioso?
description:
Is It Delicioso?

This is a game made by my friends and I for a school project after having learnt Unity for about half a year (a little more for me). We randomly came up with this idea and decided it would be cool to make. It isn't the best thing we could have made but we tried :)

Have fun!

Ideas referenced off "Can Your Pet" ;)
